default_repo.prompt: What is your primary GitHub repository? (e.g., your-org/your-repo)

pagerduty_email.prompt: What is the email address associated with your PagerDuty user/API Key?

github_api_base_url.prompt: What is your GitHub Enterprise Server API URL? (e.g., https://github.mycompany.com/api/v3)

pagerduty_api_base_url.prompt: What is your PagerDuty Enterprise Server API URL? (e.g., https://github.mycompany.com/api/v3)

jsm_instance_url.prompt: What is your JSM Cloud instance URL?

jsm_user_email.prompt: What is the email address for your JSM user?

dd_site_url.prompt: What is the Datadog site URL?
